section.title:
quantity on hand by zone
zones quantity on hand for Quantities on Hand by Zone
section.para: To view Quantities on Hand by Zone, select the "Quantities on Hand by Zone" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Quantities on Hand by Zone, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify Zone whose Quantity on Hand you want to display. Displays Quantity on Hand for selected Zone.
